data.eml:eml: The genus Neohydatothrips (Thysanoptera: Thripidae) in Iran with one new species and first record of a micropterous form

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Minaei, Kambiz (2016): The genus Neohydatothrips (Thysanoptera: Thripidae) in Iran with one new species and first record of a micropterous form. Zootaxa 4189 (2): 367-377, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4189.2.10
